titles.title: A bill to prohibit operations by the Coast Guard in the Persian Gulf region.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Executive Comment Requested from DOT, DOD.
Referred to Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Navigation.

bill.summary: 4/26/1988--Introduced. Prohibits the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating, notwithstanding any other law, from authorizing the use of any resources of the Coast Guard to carry out activities in the Persian Gulf region, other than activities which were carried out during the one-year period ending April 26, 1988.
